recipe.title: Green Bean Salad with Tuna Sauce and Olives
ingredients: 1 (3-ounce) can white tuna packed in oil, drained and flaked
2 tablespoons Niçoise or other small brine-cured black olives
instructions: Cook beans in a large pot of boiling salted water , uncovered, until crisp-tender, 4 to 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a large bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. When beans are cold, drain and pat dry with paper towels, then arrange on a platter and season with salt.

Purée tuna with olive oil, water, lemon juice, and anchovy paste in a blender, scraping down sides as necessary, until very smooth. Season sauce with salt and pepper and spoon over beans. Scatter olives and parsley leaves on top.
